Title: Relates to creating a respiratory therapy demonstration program for residential health care facilities
Summary: Relates to creating a respiratory therapy demonstration program for residential health care facilities; authorizes the commissioner of health approve up to ten residential health care facilities within the state to operate respiratory therapy units.
LawCode: Add ยง2832, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating a respiratory therapy demonstration program for residential health care facilities
